content:
It looks like I made a mistake! I got a bit carried away with the playlist suggestions. Please disregard my previous message. Let's focus on the playlist structure and song selection.

To answer your original question, including a special song or message for your sister's birthday is a great idea! You could add a birthday-themed song or a personalized message to make the moment even more special. Just be sure to balance it with the rest of the playlist to keep the party going.

What do you think about adding a birthday-themed song or message to the playlist?
